items.title: Five people found dead in central Israel; Experts suspect drug-related deaths
items.summary: Police found drugs and suspect no foul play. 'It's very unusual: You don't see that many deaths of young people in such a short period of time,' Dr. Roy Zucker, an internal medicine and infectious disease specialist, says. 'It could be a change in the drugs' chemical composition or concentration'
